attributes.deffile:
Bootstrap: docker
From: bids/ndmg

%help
You are in the BIDS-ndmg container. To see help run
singularity run BIDS-ndmg.simg -h

%runscript
    exec ndmg_bids "$@"

%labels
Author greg.kiar@mail.mcgill.ca
Build-date 30/01/2018
Vendor Ubuntu
Version v0.1.0

%post
    echo "For more information on ndmg, go to:"
    echo "http://m2g.io"
